entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Hi, I'd like to return a pair of cycling shoes, order number 789456.
Okay, I can help you with that. Can you confirm that the shoes are in their original, unused condition and in the original packaging?
Well, I did try them on and I *may* have... well, I did mount them on my bike to see how they felt. They just didn't quite fit right after a ride.
I understand. Just to clarify, you mentioned you mounted them on your bike. Does that mean you actually installed cleats on the shoes?
Yes, I installed cleats. And I rode about ten miles with them. You can see the cleat marks on the bottom of the shoe.

I see. Unfortunately, because the shoes have been mounted and used, with visible cleat marks, we are unable to accept them as a return. Once cleats are installed, and the shoes have been used, they're considered to be in a condition that we cannot resell as new. Our return policy only covers items in new and unused condition.
Oh. Okay, I understand. What about these tires? I bought them last week but decided to go with a different brand.
And what's the condition of the tires? Have they been mounted or used?
Yeah, they were mounted, but I only rode them for a bit around the block. They have dirty tires now.

Unfortunately, similar to the shoes, we are unable to accept returns on tires that have been mounted, especially when there are dirty tires present from use. We cannot resell them once they've been used on the road, even for a short distance. It's part of our hygiene and quality standards.
Oh, I see. So, because they've been installed, even briefly, I can't return either item. That's disappointing, but I understand. Thanks for explaining the policy so clearly.
You're welcome. I'm sorry we couldn't process the return this time. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks again for your help!
You're very welcome! Have a great day and happy riding with VeloFit!
